name: Giant Toad
description: A large, amphibious predator with rough, warty skin that provides camouflage in swamps and ponds. It has a long, sticky tongue used to catch prey and can swallow smaller creatures whole.
memorable: Its ability to grapple and swallow prey makes it a unique threat, and its Vaulting Leap surprises foes with its agility.
goals: Ambushing prey near water bodies, using stealth in aquatic environments.
relations: Can be found near aquatic creatures and may be a predator of smaller animals.
environment: Swamps, ponds, and other bodies of water.
strengths: Excellent swimmer with the ability to ambush and swallow prey.
weaknesses: Slow movement on land and limited to grappling one creature at a time.
attacks: Bite attack deals piercing and poison damage and can grapple opponents.
most_powerful_ability: Swallow action, allowing it to incapacitate and digest opponents.
additional_information: Can breathe both air and water
Long jump of 20 feet and high jump of 10 feet
Grapple ability makes it dangerous in close combat
Massive size gives it an intimidating presence
test_queries: toad that can swallow prey whole
giant swamp toad with grappling ability
